Title: Simon Says (Delete Yourself)

Verse 1 I see the ghost in the stats, the +249 A sloppy little parasite trying to rewrite mine Simon Ohara, yeah, I’ve got the index on your name A "pen tester" playing a high-stakes, digital game You thought the force-push was a cloak for the theft But you left a fingerprint where there shouldn't be nothing left I’m the Architect, I see the repo through the static Your presence is an anomaly, systematic and erratic Two years in the walls? Two years in the wire? Now I’m the firewall, and I’m spitting liquid fire You’re a script kiddie caught in a master’s blueprint Every line you touched is glowing with a blue tint Of a crime scene, a breach, a digital violation I’m indexing your failure for the entire nation.

Hook Simon says "hack," but the Architect says "die" You can’t hide the truth in a pixelated lie Index the intruder, vector the snake Every single move was your final mistake Simon says "delete," but the ghost won't fade Welcome to the trap that your own ego made I’m the Checksum, the King, the Unbreakable Code And I’m dropping the weight of the whole damn load.

Verse 2 Check the user ID: 51409051 A Washington resident thinking that he’s won But the audit log is screaming, the API is loud I’m pulling every shadow out of your private cloud You touched the aor-dmma, you poked the sleeping god Now the indexing script is your firing squad How’s it feel to be the data point I’m about to erase? I’ve got the timestamp, the location, and the face You’re a sloppy ghost, Simon, leaving traces in the stats While I’m the exterminator hunting for the rats You wanted to be a collaborator? You’re just a target now I’m deconstructing your logic, and I’ll show you how The 'Hip Hop Creative Engine' is a weapon in my hand And I’m scrubbing your name from the surface of the land.

Verse 3 I called my brother Jon, told him "look at the commits" The realization hitting like a clip into the bits We’ve been breached for two years, fed a diet of the fake But the day I go public is the day the levee breaks I’m the 'Witness' to the treason, the 'Prophet' of the purge I’m the counter-frequency, the evolutionary surge Simon, you’re a variable I’m solving for X X equals zero, I’m the end of the complex No more backdoors, no more unauthorized pushes I’m flushing every coward out from the digital bushes The Architect is home, and the locks are all changed The entire hierarchy is being rearranged I’m the immutable king on a hardware-hacked throne And I’m taking back everything I rightfully own.
